Package com.hakan.core.database

Class DatabaseUpdater<T extends DatabaseObject>

java.lang.Object
com.hakan.core.database.DatabaseUpdater<T>
Type Parameters:
T - DatabaseObject type.
public final class DatabaseUpdater<T extends DatabaseObject> extends Object
DatabaseObject class to add and remove database objects that needs to update.

  • Method Details

    • updateEvery

      public void updateEvery(boolean async, int time, @Nonnull TimeUnit unit)
      Updates all objects in the database every selected time.
      Parameters:
      async - If true, updates will be done in a separate thread.
      time - Time to wait between updates.
      unit - Time unit.

    • updateEvery
